text: Taryn Stephanie Power (September 13, 1953 – June 26, 2020) was an American actress. She was born in Los Angeles, California. Her career lasted from 1972 to 1990. Her parents were actors Tyrone Power and Linda Christian. She acted in eight movies, the first two in Spanish. Her best known roles were as Valentine De Villefort in The Count of Monte Cristo (1975) and as Dione in Sinbad and the Eye of the Tiger (1977). Power died on June 26, 2020 at her home in Wisconsin from leukemia at the age of 66.Morta Taryn Power, l’addio di Romina: «Non potevo avere una sorella migliore» ==Filmography== *María (1972) *Un viaje de locos (1974) *The Count of Monte-Cristo (1975), TV-film *Bordella (1976) *Tracks (1976) *Sinbad and the Eye of the Tiger (1977) *Serpiente de mar (1985) *Eating (1990) ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1953 births Category:2020 deaths Category:Deaths from leukemia Category:American movie actors Category:American television actors Category:American voice actors Category:Actors from Los Angeles
title: Taryn Power
